description:
His work spans heartfelt tributes to harmonica greats Toots Thielemans and
Mauricio Einhorn, cross-cultural collaborations across continents, and
inventive reimaginings of pop and rock classics. Named Best Brazilian
Instrumental Artist in 2023, Gabriel continues to expand the expressive range
of the harmonica, captivating audiences worldwide with his mastery and
creative spirit.
name: Windmills Music Night - Gabriel Grossi

performer.description: Gabriel Grossi stands among the world’s foremost harmonica virtuosos and a defining voice in Brazilian instrumental music. A prolific composer, producer, and performer, he has collaborated with luminaries such as Hermeto Pascoal, Milton Nascimento, Chico Buarque, Jacob Collier, and Snarky Puppy. Formerly part of the Hamilton de Holanda Quintet, Grossi has released 15 acclaimed albums that traverse jazz, forró, and Brazilian popular music—merging tradition with bold innovation.
performer.name: Gabriel Grossi

description:
From the laid-back charm of Cubbon Park to the pulsating rhythm of Techno
Police, the record weaves cinematic grooves that invite movement and joy.
Following acclaimed singles Jonty Patel and Ratna Mahal, the People to Meet,
Places to See - Album Launch marks a milestone in their journey, showcasing
their evolution as one of India's most dynamic and genre-bending live acts.
name: Windmills Music Night - Derek & The Cats

performer.description: Derek & The Cats is a Bangalore-based band led by Derek Mathias, known for their infectious blend of jazz, funk, and house. Renowned for their high-energy instrumental performances, the ensemble brings a fresh, dance-driven sound to every stage. Their second album, People to Meet, Places to See, is a sonic diary of life on the road—each track capturing a city, mood, or moment from their India tours.
performer.name: Derek & The Cats

description:
Formed in 2014, the band's sound grew organically -- unhurried, unboxed, and
deeply human. Each song carries traces of their travels, their reflections,
and their belief that difference can be unifying. With poetic songwriting and
simple yet stirring compositions, The Tapi Project invites listeners to flow
with them -- to drift, to feel, and to rise.
name: Windmills Music Night - The Tapi Project

performer.description: The Tapi project echoes contemporary India and its new gods & demons - urban life and the challenges the common man faces in a modern world.
performer.name: The Tapi Project
